name: InterventionsRelatedToMedicationRegimenChangeMedicationDosageForm
title: Interventions Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication Dosage Form
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent instances when a provider intervenes to change a medication dosage form within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Intervention

The intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy intervention to change a medication dosage form within a prescribed treatment regimen.  These codes are documented separately from the explicit action taken place to execute an order within a system, and are used for intervention tracking,),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent an intervention has occurred to change a medication dosage form within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent a recommendation to intervene or explicit actions that are not specifically for changing a medication dosage form within a prescribed treatment regimen.)
